title: ControllerPartSensor

name: ControllerPartSensor
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  A Class.SensorBase that outputs data about another Class.BasePart based on
  Class.Humanoid floor and ladder detection logic.
description: |
  A Class.SensorBase that outputs data about another Class.BasePart based on
  Class.Humanoid floor and ladder detection logic. It is primarily used for
  sending data to a character controller. Using a Class.ControllerPartSensor
  allows you to detect Class.BasePart|BaseParts in the same manner as the
  Class.Humanoid uses for detecting floors and ladders.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - ControllerSensor

  - name: ControllerPartSensor.SensedPart
    summary: |

    description: |
      A reference to the Class.BasePart hit by the sensor.
    codesamples: []
    type: BasePart
    tags: []

  - name: ControllerPartSensor.SensorMode
    summary: |
      Determines what behavior this Class.SensorBase uses when sensing other
      parts.
    description: |
      Determines what behavior this Class.SensorBase uses when sensing other
      parts.

      A setting of Enum.SensorMode.Ladder performs the same ladder detection
      logic used by a Class.Humanoid to populate sensor output. It currently
      always senses along the forward vector of its parent Class.BasePart.

      A setting of Enum.SensorMode.Floor performs the same floor detection
      logic used by a Class.Humanoid to populate sensor output. It currently
      always senses along the negative up vector of the world.
    codesamples: []
    type: SensorMode
    tags: []

    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Input
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Basic
